snippet: New books suggest ways for investors to do well even when the economy is going through a tough spell.
abstract: Paul B Brown Off the Shelf column reviews books Investing in the Second Lost Decade by Martin J Pring, Joe D Turner and Tom J Kopas, and The Chinese Way to Wealth and Prosperity by Michael Justin Lee.
lead_paragraph: New books suggest ways for investors to do well even when the economy is going through a tough spell.

headline.seo: Investment Books Offer Ways Around Doom and Gloom - Review
headline.main: Paths Around Investment Gloom and Doom
headline.print_headline: Paths Around Investment Gloom and Doom
